transcript:
Customer: Hello baba?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Namaskar sir.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Awaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Mujhe aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha bataiye sir.
Customer: Manish ji kya update hai?
Executive: A, sir 5 baje, 5 baje de dijiye sir, 5 baje final ho jayega sir.
Customer: Mere pass kya update hai?
Executive: Matlab closure ka aapka sara sab kuch ho jayega aaj hi sir.
Customer: Mera refund kab aayega ye bataiye.
Executive: A, aaj process ho jayega sir to, a, working day sir seven hota hai, lekin maximum sir panch, panch din.
Customer: Working day waise seven batate hai sir lekin panch, teen se panch din me hi ho jayega sir aapko.
Customer: Mujhe ye sab aap mail kab karne wale hai?
Executive: Mail, mai nahi karne wala, ye matlab jo team karti hai wo karne wali hai. Ye aaj download ho jayega, may be sir aaj ya kal aapko sari details chali jayegi ki kya kuch kaise kaise aapko payment jane wala hai, kis account me, kis tarikh ko aapko jane wala hai. To ye sari chize aapko.
Customer: Aap logo ka aapas me coordination nahi hota hai?
Executive: A, proper to nahi hota hai sir kyuki gap, gap hai sir, hierarchy ka gap rehta hai. Mai as a gap kam karta hu sir.
Customer: Hierarchy ka gap rehta hai to wo meri problem to nahi hai na?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Agar hierarchy ka aapke sath gap hai to ye meri problem hai?
Executive: Gap in the sense, gap in the sense communicate hoti hai wo mail ke through communicate hoti hai sir.
Customer: Mail ke communicate hoti to mail padha jata hai na bhai, aap mere ko mail bhejenge to mai padhunga na?
Executive: Ha, aapko jo mail required hogi wo mail aapko. Agar aapke employees mail nahi padh rahe hai to ye meri galti hai?
Executive: Mail, mail jo aapko jayegi sir wo proper jo aapko required hogi wo mail bhi jayegi sir. Main sir, thik hai. Aap wo mat sochiye na sir, dekhiye, aaj final aapka jo bhi hoga sir final ho jayega. Sham ko 5 baje tak main sir ho jayega, thik hai?
Customer: Sham ko 5 baje tak aapke taraf se closure aa jayega?
Executive: Ha, IndiaMART ki taraf se aa jayega.
Customer: Mera kab tak aap kis din tak ka paisa katenge usme?
Executive: Ye bhi sir aapko update sham 5 baje tak mil jayega sir.
Customer: Wait lijiyega 5 baje kabhi hota nahi aap logo ka.
Executive: Thik, thik hai sir, mai aapko update kar dunga. Koshish kariye ki aaj ho jaye, panch ka panch aati ho.
Executive: Thik, thik sir, thik sir.
Customer: Thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Jab jab bhi aap bolenge.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiring about the refund and closure.

- Inquiring about the coordination issue.



Resolution:

- Informed refund process will take 3-5 days.

- Informed that the final closure will be done by 5 PM.

- Assured to provide an update by 5 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, closure, coordination, mail
